Articles.Content:
Hello, so  an anyone help me out with this issue?  When I Accelerate my plane beginns to shake and if I pitch up it jolts sideways. 

https://gyazo.com/d9852f1284351a8c30fadf69e830c388

Edit:Due to an answer I now want to close this thread, but dont know how lmao.

Edited June 26, 2020 by LF_Ion

Check your spring and damper settings in the PAW (right click menu).  Try changing the spring and damper strengths; that might help.  If not, the landing gear may not be pointed straight forward, which can be solved using snap mode in the editor.  1.9.1 is causing some odd problems with landing gear, but this kind of issue has been around for years.

22 minutes ago, Entropian said:

Check your spring and damper settings in the PAW (right click menu).  Try changing the spring and damper strengths; that might help.  If not, the landing gear may not be pointed straight forward, which can be solved using snap mode in the editor.  1.9.1 is causing some odd problems with landing gear, but this kind of issue has been around for years.

Much appreciated,  and that was quick too. Thank you.
